sections: Just a quick reminder about tonight’s special

team will be there to answer subscribers' questions. We are going to try to answer everyone’s questions — and we are going to try to bring subscribers on stage, so have your camera and audio ready. In advance of the event, you can start posting your questions right now at the event link below. Just go to the link and at the bottom of the screen there will be “Ask A Question.”

It will be an open discussion about all the news of the day, and all of our plans for 2021. Grab a beer and join us — it’s going to be fun. Bonus: we’ll tell you a little about the new subscriber-only product we’re about to launch.

These live events are exclusively for Daily Poster subscribers, who will be able to watch the broadcasts live and ask questions in real time. Please register for the event ahead of time at the Crowdcast link below.
The Thanksgiving Eve event is at 7:30pm ET (4:30pm PT) on Wednesday 11/25.
To participate, subscribers should go to this link: https://www.crowdcast.io/e/thanksgiving-eve-with
• Go to the event link and register for the event right now so that you don’t have to deal with login/registration issues at the time of the event.
• Copy and paste the event URL into your browser and copy and paste the event password in. The event URL is: https://www.crowdcast.io/e/thanksgiving-eve-with
• If possible, please try to use a regular desktop or laptop computer, and use the Chrome browser. You can read more about browser compatibility
• If you want to participate using an iPhone or iPad, you can download Crowdcast’s app

• If you are connected to the live broadcast and have connectivity issues, you should refresh your browser; hit "Help" at the top of the screen (which enters you into compatibility mode); and click the settings cog icon on the bottom right corner and switch to 360p resolution.
